00075 //----------------------------------------------------------
00076 void
00077 MQuat::MakeRotFast( MMat3x3& rot ) const
00078 {
00080         float x2 = GetX() + GetX();
00081         float y2 = GetY() + GetY();
00082         float z2 = GetZ() + GetZ();
00083         float xx = GetX() * x2;
00084         float xy = GetX() * y2;
00085         float xz = GetX() * z2;
00086         float yy = GetY() * y2;
00087         float yz = GetY() * z2;
00088         float zz = GetZ() * z2;
00089         float wx = GetW() * x2;
00090         float wy = GetW() * y2;
00091         float wz = GetW() * z2;
00092 
00094         rot( 0, 0 ) = 1.0f - (yy + zz);
00095         rot( 0, 1 ) = xy - wz;
00096         rot( 0, 2 ) = xz + wy;
00097 
00098         rot( 1, 0 ) = xy + wz;
00099         rot( 1, 1 ) = 1.0f - (xx + zz);
00100         rot( 1, 2 ) = yz - wx;
00101 
00102         rot( 2, 0 ) = xz - wy;
00103         rot( 2, 1 ) = yz + wx;
00104         rot( 2, 2 ) = 1.0f - (xx + yy);
00105 }
00106 
00107 //----------------------------------------------------------
00108 MMat3x3
00109 MQuat::MakeRot() const
00110 {
00112         float x2 = GetX() + GetX();
00113         float y2 = GetY() + GetY();
00114         float z2 = GetZ() + GetZ();
00115         float xx = GetX() * x2;
00116         float xy = GetX() * y2;
00117         float xz = GetX() * z2;
00118         float yy = GetY() * y2;
00119         float yz = GetY() * z2;
00120         float zz = GetZ() * z2;
00121         float wx = GetW() * x2;
00122         float wy = GetW() * y2;
00123         float wz = GetW() * z2;
00124 
00126         return MMat3x3( 1.0f - (yy + zz), xy - wz, xz + wy,
00127                                         xy + wz, 1.0f - (xx + zz), yz - wx,
00128                                         xz - wy, yz + wx, 1.0f - (xx + yy) );
00129 }
00130 
00131 //----------------------------------------------------------
00132 void
00133 MQuat::SetMatrixRot( MMat4x4& mat ) const
00134 {
00136         float x2 = GetX() + GetX();
00137         float y2 = GetY() + GetY();
00138         float z2 = GetZ() + GetZ();
00139         float xx = GetX() * x2;
00140         float xy = GetX() * y2;
00141         float xz = GetX() * z2;
00142         float yy = GetY() * y2;
00143         float yz = GetY() * z2;
00144         float zz = GetZ() * z2;
00145         float wx = GetW() * x2;
00146         float wy = GetW() * y2;
00147         float wz = GetW() * z2;
00148 
00150         mat( 0, 0 ) = 1.0f - (yy + zz);
00151         mat( 0, 1 ) = xy - wz;
00152         mat( 0, 2 ) = xz + wy;
00153 
00154         mat( 1, 0 ) = xy + wz;
00155         mat( 1, 1 ) = 1.0f - (xx + zz);
00156         mat( 1, 2 ) = yz - wx;
00157 
00158         mat( 2, 0 ) = xz - wy;
00159         mat( 2, 1 ) = yz + wx;
00160         mat( 2, 2 ) = 1.0f - (xx + yy);
00161 }

00163 //----------------------------------------------------------
00164 MQuat
00165 MQuat::operator * ( const MQuat& rhs ) const
00166 {
00168         float w = GetW()*rhs.GetW() - ( GetX()*rhs.GetX() + GetY()*rhs.GetY() + GetZ()*rhs.GetZ() );
00169 
00171         float x = GetY()*rhs.GetZ() - GetZ()*rhs.GetY();
00172         float y = GetZ()*rhs.GetX() - GetX()*rhs.GetZ();
00173         float z = GetX()*rhs.GetY() - GetY()*rhs.GetX();
00174         x += GetW() * rhs.GetX();
00175         x += rhs.GetW() * GetX();
00176         y += GetW() * rhs.GetY();
00177         y += rhs.GetW() * GetY();
00178         z += GetW() * rhs.GetZ();
00179         z += rhs.GetW() * GetZ();
00180 
00182         return MQuat( x, y, z, w );
00183 }
00184 
00185 //----------------------------------------------------------
00186 MQuat&
00187 MQuat::operator *= ( const MQuat& rhs )
00188 {
00190         float w = GetW()*rhs.GetW() - ( GetX()*rhs.GetX() + GetY()*rhs.GetY() + GetZ()*rhs.GetZ() );
00191 
00193         float x = GetY()*rhs.GetZ() - GetZ()*rhs.GetY();
00194         float y = GetZ()*rhs.GetX() - GetX()*rhs.GetZ();
00195         float z = GetX()*rhs.GetY() - GetY()*rhs.GetX();
00196         x += GetW() * rhs.GetX();
00197         x += rhs.GetW() * GetX();
00198         y += GetW() * rhs.GetY();
00199         y += rhs.GetW() * GetY();
00200         z += GetW() * rhs.GetZ();
00201         z += rhs.GetW() * GetZ();
00202 
00204         SetX( x );
00205         SetY( y );
00206         SetZ( z );
00207         SetW( w );
00208 
00209         return *this;
00210 }

00212 //----------------------------------------------------------
00213 void
00214 MQuat::Invert()
00215 {
00216         SetX( -GetX() );
00217         SetY( -GetY() );
00218         SetZ( -GetZ() );
00219 }
00220 
00221 //----------------------------------------------------------
00222 MQuat
00223 MQuat::Inverted() const
00224 {
00225         return MQuat( -GetX(), -GetY(), -GetZ(), GetW() );
00226 }
00227 
00228 //----------------------------------------------------------
00229 void
00230 MQuat::Normalize()
00231 {
00232         float invMag = 1.0f/Sqrt( GetX()*GetX() + GetY()*GetY() + GetZ()*GetZ() + GetW()*GetW() );
00233         SetX( invMag*GetX() );
00234         SetY( invMag*GetY() );
00235         SetZ( invMag*GetZ() );
00236         SetW( invMag*GetW() );
00237 }
00238 
00239 //----------------------------------------------------------
00240 MQuat
00241 MQuat::Normalized() const
00242 {
00243         float invMag = 1.0f/Sqrt( GetX()*GetX() + GetY()*GetY() + GetZ()*GetZ() + GetW()*GetW() );
00244         return MQuat( invMag*GetX(), invMag*GetY(), invMag*GetZ(), invMag*GetW() );
00245 }

00247 //----------------------------------------------------------
00248 void
00249 MQuat::SlerpToFast( const MQuat& to, float t )
00250 {
00252         float to1[4];
00253         float omega, cosom, sinom, scale0, scale1;
00254 
00256     cosom = GetX() * to.GetX() + GetY() * to.GetY() + GetZ() * to.GetZ() + GetW() * to.GetW();
00257 
00259     if ( cosom < 0.0 )
00260         {
00261                 cosom = -cosom;
00262                 to1[0] = -to.GetX();
00263                 to1[1] = -to.GetY();
00264                 to1[2] = -to.GetZ();
00265                 to1[3] = -to.GetW();
00266     }
00267         else
00268         {
00269                 to1[0] = to.GetX();
00270                 to1[1] = to.GetY();
00271                 to1[2] = to.GetZ();
00272                 to1[3] = to.GetW();
00273     }
00274 
00276     if ( (1.0f - cosom) > 0.001f )
00277         {
00279                 omega = ACos( cosom );
00280                 sinom = Sin( omega );
00281                 scale0 = Sin( ( 1.0f - t ) * omega ) / sinom;
00282                 scale1 = Sin( t * omega ) / sinom;
00283     }
00284         else
00285         {
00288                 scale0 = 1.0f - t;
00289                 scale1 = t;
00290     }
00291 
00293         SetX( scale0 * GetX() + scale1 * to1[0] );
00294         SetY( scale0 * GetY() + scale1 * to1[1] );
00295         SetZ( scale0 * GetZ() + scale1 * to1[2] );
00296         SetW( scale0 * GetW() + scale1 * to1[3] );
00297 }
00298 
00299 //----------------------------------------------------------
00300 MQuat
00301 MQuat::SlerpTo( const MQuat& to, float t ) const
00302 {
00304         float to1[4];
00305         float omega, cosom, sinom, scale0, scale1;
00306 
00308     cosom = GetX() * to.GetX() + GetY() * to.GetY() + GetZ() * to.GetZ() + GetW() * to.GetW();
00309 
00311     if ( cosom < 0.0 )
00312         {
00313                 cosom = -cosom;
00314                 to1[0] = -to.GetX();
00315                 to1[1] = -to.GetY();
00316                 to1[2] = -to.GetZ();
00317                 to1[3] = -to.GetW();
00318     }
00319         else
00320         {
00321                 to1[0] = to.GetX();
00322                 to1[1] = to.GetY();
00323                 to1[2] = to.GetZ();
00324                 to1[3] = to.GetW();
00325     }
00326 
00328     if ( (1.0 - cosom) > 0.001f )
00329         {
00331                 omega = ACos( cosom );
00332                 sinom = Sin( omega );
00333                 scale0 = Sin( ( 1.0f - t ) * omega ) / sinom;
00334                 scale1 = Sin( t * omega ) / sinom;
00335     }
00336         else
00337         {
00340                 scale0 = 1.0f - t;
00341                 scale1 = t;
00342     }
00343 
00345         return MQuat(   scale0 * GetX() + scale1 * to1[0],
00346                                         scale0 * GetY() + scale1 * to1[1],
00347                                         scale0 * GetZ() + scale1 * to1[2],
00348                                         scale0 * GetW() + scale1 * to1[3] );
00349 }

00351 //----------------------------------------------------------
00352 void
00353 MQuat::SlerpFromIdentFast( float t )
00354 {
00356         float to1[4];
00357         float omega, cosom, sinom, scale0, scale1;
00358 
00360     cosom = GetW();
00361 
00363     if ( cosom < 0.0 )
00364         {
00365                 cosom = -cosom;
00366                 to1[0] = -GetX();
00367                 to1[1] = -GetY();
00368                 to1[2] = -GetZ();
00369                 to1[3] = -GetW();
00370     }
00371         else
00372         {
00373                 to1[0] = GetX();
00374                 to1[1] = GetY();
00375                 to1[2] = GetZ();
00376                 to1[3] = GetW();
00377     }
00378 
00380     if ( (1.0 - cosom) > 0.001f )
00381         {
00383                 omega = ACos( cosom );
00384                 sinom = Sin( omega );
00385                 scale0 = Sin( ( 1.0f - t ) * omega ) / sinom;
00386                 scale1 = Sin( t * omega ) / sinom;
00387     }
00388         else
00389         {
00392                 scale0 = 1.0f - t;
00393                 scale1 = t;
00394     }
00395 
00397         SetX( scale1 * to1[0] );
00398         SetY( scale1 * to1[1] );
00399         SetZ( scale1 * to1[2] );
00400         SetW( scale0 + scale1 * to1[3] );
00401 }

00403 //----------------------------------------------------------
00404 MQuat
00405 MQuat::SlerpFromIdent( float t )
00406 {
00408         float to1[4];
00409         float omega, cosom, sinom, scale0, scale1;
00410 
00412     cosom = GetW();
00413 
00415     if ( cosom < 0.0 )
00416         {
00417                 cosom = -cosom;
00418                 to1[0] = -GetX();
00419                 to1[1] = -GetY();
00420                 to1[2] = -GetZ();
00421                 to1[3] = -GetW();
00422     }
00423         else
00424         {
00425                 to1[0] = GetX();
00426                 to1[1] = GetY();
00427                 to1[2] = GetZ();
00428                 to1[3] = GetW();
00429     }
00430 
00432     if ( (1.0 - cosom) > 0.001f )
00433         {
00435                 omega = ACos( cosom );
00436                 sinom = Sin( omega );
00437                 scale0 = Sin( ( 1.0f - t ) * omega ) / sinom;
00438                 scale1 = Sin( t * omega ) / sinom;
00439     }
00440         else
00441         {
00444                 scale0 = 1.0f - t;
00445                 scale1 = t;
00446     }
00447 
00449         return MQuat(   scale1 * to1[0],
00450                                         scale1 * to1[1],
00451                                         scale1 * to1[2],
00452                                         scale0 + scale1 * to1[3] );
00453 }

00455 //----------------------------------------------------------
00456 void
00457 MQuat::BlendFromIdentFast( float t )
00458 {
00460     float cosom = GetW();
00461         if ( Abs( cosom ) > 0.9995 )
00462         {
00463                 SetX( Lerp( 0.0f, GetX(), t ) );
00464                 SetY( Lerp( 0.0f, GetY(), t ) );
00465                 SetZ( Lerp( 0.0f, GetZ(), t ) );
00466                 SetW( Lerp( 0.0f, GetW(), t ) );
00467                 return;
00468         }
00469 
00471         float omega = ACos( cosom );
00472         float sinom = Sin( omega );
00473         float scale1 = Sin( t * omega ) / sinom;
00474 
00476         SetX( scale1 * GetX() );
00477         SetY( scale1 * GetY() );
00478         SetZ( scale1 * GetZ() );
00479         SetW( Cos( t * omega ) );
00480 }

00487 //----------------------------------------------------------
00488 void
00489 MQuat::MakeFromMat3x3( const MMat3x3& rot )
00490 {
00491         float  tr, s, q[4];
00492         int    i, j, k;
00493 
00494         int nxt[3] = {1, 2, 0};
00495         tr = rot(0, 0) + rot(1, 1) + rot(2, 2);
00496 
00498         if ( tr > 0.0f )
00499         {
00501                 s = Sqrt( tr + 1.0f );
00502                 SetW( s / 2.0f );
00503                 s = 0.5f / s;
00504                 SetX( (rot( 2, 1 ) - rot( 1, 2 )) * s );
00505                 SetY( (rot( 0, 2 ) - rot( 2, 0 )) * s );
00506                 SetZ( (rot( 1, 0 ) - rot( 0, 1 )) * s );
00507         }
00508         else
00509         {
00511                 i = 0;
00512                 if ( rot( 1, 1 ) > rot( 0, 0 ) )
00513                         i = 1;
00514                 if ( rot( 2, 2 ) > rot( i, i ) )
00515                         i = 2;
00516                 j = nxt[i];
00517                 k = nxt[j];
00518 
00519                 s = Sqrt( (rot( i, i ) - (rot( j, j ) + rot( k, k ))) + 1.0f );
00520                 q[i] = s * 0.5f;
00521                 if ( s != 0.0f )
00522                         s = 0.5f / s;
00523 
00524                 q[3] = (rot( k, j ) - rot( j, k )) * s;
00525                 q[j] = (rot( j, i ) + rot( i, j )) * s;
00526                 q[k] = (rot( k, i ) + rot( i, k )) * s;
00527 
00528                 SetX( q[0] );
00529                 SetY( q[1] );
00530                 SetZ( q[2] );
00531                 SetW( q[3] );
00532         }
00533 }
